about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Energy Bowman
  • Ranger with Shield
  • Sorceror with Focus
  • Wizard in Green
  • Tiefling Sorceress
  • Young Warrior
  • Half-Giant Warrior
  • Half-Giant Fighter
  • Druid of the Wood
  • Armsman of the Realm
  • Barbarian with club
  • Dark Elves (Witch, Sorceress, Champion, Caster, Bladesman, Assassin, Wizard and Crossbow Pistolier)
  • Cthulanite (Monk, Bladesman, Merchant and Wizard)
  • Roper

Requires: An active subscription or license of Fantasy Grounds. It will work with any ruleset.
detailed_description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

  • Energy Bowman
  • Ranger with Shield
  • Sorceror with Focus
  • Wizard in Green

Minimum:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
